overview: Three couples. One huge house. A ton of sex toys. Put them all together and you get the recipe for unprecedented raunchiness in Adam and Eve's latest lust story- House Party 3. No matter what kind of sexual combo you prefer- you'll find just about every variation on a sexual theme played out in this sexy-yet sensual look at modern day swapping- directed by one of porndom's greatest stars and hot new directors- Veronica Hart.
tagline: Cum to our House Party ... you'll have a swinging good time!
title: Adam and Eve's House Party 3
